Gestorben: ca. Oktober 12, 2011(2011-10-12) (Alter 70), Berkeley Heights, New Jersey,
bekannt für: ALTRAN, B, BCPL, C, Multics, Unix
Auszeichnungen: Turing Award (1983), National Medal of Technology (1998), IEEE Richard W. Hamming Medal (1990), Computer Pioneer Award (1994), Computer History Museum Fellow (1997), Harold Pender Award (2003), Japan Prize (2011)
